program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, k

   integer :: count =0

   integer(kind=8), allocatable :: set(:)

         set_size = set_size +1

               exit

            else if (set(mid) < target) then

               low = mid +1

            else

               high = mid -1

            end if

         end do

         if (.not. found) then

            set_size = set_size +1

            set(set_size) = current

            count = count +1

         end if

      end if

   end do

   ! Convert count to string for second part

   write(word, '(i0)') count

   word = trim(word)

   ! Second part

   count_upper =0

   count_lower =0

   integer :: len_word = len_trim(word)

   character(len=1) :: c

   do i=1, len_word

      c = word(i:i)

      if (c >= 'A' .and. c <= 'Z') then

         count_upper = count_upper +1

      else if (c >= 'a' .and. c <= 'z') then

         count_lower = count_lower +1

      end if

   end do

   if (count_upper > count_lower) then

      output_word = uppercase(word)

   else

      output_word = lowercase(word)

   end if

   ! Function to convert to uppercase or lowercase

   contains

   function uppercase(s) result(res)

      character(len=*), intent(in) :: s

      character(len=len(s)) :: res

      integer :: i

      do i=1, len(s)

         if (s(i:i) >= 'a' .and. s(i:i) <= 'z') then

            res(i:i) = achar(ichar(s(i:i)) - 32)

         else

            res(i:i) = s(i:i)

         end if

      end do

   end function

   function lowercase(s) result(res)

      character(len=*), intent(in) :: s

      character(len=len(s)) :: res

      integer :: i

      do i=1, len(s)

         if (s(i:i) >= 'A' .and. s(i:i) <= 'Z') then

            res(i:i) = achar(ichar(s(i:i)) + 32)

         else

            res(i:i) = s(i:i)

         end if

      end do

   end function

   end contains

   ! Now, process output_word to get position

   read(output_word, '(i0)') position

   ! Third part

   integer(kind=8) :: nrstSeqStartIndx =1

   do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx *2) < position)

      nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2

   end do

   do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= position)

      nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1

   end do

   integer(kind=8) :: startIndex = getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx)

   result = position - startIndex +1

   print*, result

contains

   integer(kind=8) function getValueAtIndex(index)

      integer(kind=8), intent(in) :: index

      getValueAtIndex = 1 + (index-1)*index/2

   end function

end program main
